[ library(calendar) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

jd_to_mjd(++JD, ?MJD)

Convert Julian Dates (JD) to Modified Julian Dates (MJD)
JD
Integer or float
MJD
Variable or float

Description

Convert Julian Dates (JD) to Modified Julian Dates (MJD). The relationship is simply MJD = JD-2400000.5
